The Longest Shortest Time

Project Management, Wordpress Site Development

My goal is to create lasting impressions.

A mutual colleague introduced me to Hillary in 2013. She needed to rebuild her website, as she had just gotten funding through a kickstarter campaign to take her podcast to the next level.

Request:
Create site for The Longest Shortest Time podcast.

Solution:
Wordpress is a great tool for organizing lots of content, and easy to manage for content publishers.

Technologies:
Wordpress, JS, HTML, CSS, LAMP.
